content.howToPlay: Use WASD or the Arrow keys to direct the vehicleUse the Space key as the handbrakeUse C to change the camera viewUse R for resetting the vehicleUse U to change KMH > MPHUse I for starting or stopping the engineUse P for Full Screen
content.tips: The more you hold the vehicle drifting, the more points you take. In order to do that, you can choose some specific tracks like the racetrack or the highway. They enable you to drift around the corners freely. To sail perfectly in the long run, you can tune up and upgrade your vehicle in the Garage menu to get the maximum slide.

fullContent: Home› DriftDrift Hunters ProBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenCan you hear the engine moaning? Drift Hunters Pro is a thrilling 3D game with high-quality graphics for those who are fond of drifting & racing. You can play solely, or you can play on the servers with other players. In this game, you have 6 different tracks and 10 upgradable vehicles in the garage that you can buy with earnings via drifting. Enjoy the tire track!How to Play Drift Hunters Pro?Use WASD or the Arrow keys to direct the vehicleUse the Space key as the handbrakeUse C to change the camera viewUse R for resetting the vehicleUse U to change KMH > MPHUse I for starting or stopping the engineUse P for Full ScreenGarageIn the Garage menu, you have 10 different types of vehicles. As you earn rewards while drifting, in the meantime, you are unlocking a new car. Plus, you can modify your vehicle as you wish! Paint them aesthetically, upgrade the cars, adjust the tunings, choose your wheels. Head over to our blog post to learn how to choose a car for drifting.Upgrading the VehiclesUse your car in its entirety! The more you strengthen the vehicle, the more efficiency you will get from it. As mentioned in the Garage section, you can upgrade your vehicle's features. These features involve:EngineTurboGearboxHandlingWeightTuning UpAlong with upgrading, you can modify your vehicle physically. You can adjust the following:Front HeightRear HeightFront CamberRear CamberTurbo PressureBrake BalanceBrake PressureTricks & Tips for Drift Hunters ProThe more you hold the vehicle drifting, the more points you take. In order to do that, you can choose some specific tracks like the racetrack or the highway. They enable you to drift around the corners freely. To sail perfectly in the long run, you can tune up and upgrade your vehicle in the Garage menu to get the maximum slide. Can I play Drift Hunters Pro with my friends?Yes, you can play Drift Hunters Pro with multiplayer mode on OnlineGames.io. Create a room by selecting the multiplayer mode after hitting the play button on the main menu.
